insert into B_S_0010301 (ID, MAINID, ZJQDID, FJZCH, BJLX, JH, XLH, DJBH, ZWMS, JKFLBH, JKLBH, JK_SZ, JK_DW, WHDWID, WHRID, WHSJ, ZT, DPRTCODE, TBBS, BJYY, BJYY_DW, ZJHYY, ZJHYY_DW)
select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bjlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.jh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.xlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.djbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jkflbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jklbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jkSz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jkDw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tbbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.bjyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bjyyDw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.zjhyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zjhyyDw,jdbcType=DECIMAL} from dual
mapper.update:
update B_S_0010301 set WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TBBS = #{tbbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

MERGE INTO B_S_00101 A USING ( SELECT C.*,B1.CJ FROM ( SELECT T.ZJQDID,T.JKLBH,BJYY,BJYY_DW,ZJHYY,ZJHYY_DW,ZT,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY T.ZJQDID,T.JKLBH ORDER BY T.BJYY) RN FROM B_S_0010301 T WHERE T.ZT = 1 )C LEFT JOIN B_S_001 B1 ON B1.ID = C.ZJQDID WHERE C.RN = 1 ) B ON (A.ZJQDID = B.ZJQDID AND A.JKLBH = B.JKLBH AND B.ZT = 1) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.BJYY = B.BJYY, A.BJYY_DW = B.BJYY_DW, A.ZJHYY = B.ZJHYY, A.ZJHYY_DW = B.ZJHYY_DW, A.ZJYY = CASE WHEN B.CJ = 1 and b.jklbh != 'fuselage_flight_time' and b.jklbh != 'landing_gear_cycle' and b.jklbh != 'special_first' and b.jklbh != 'special_second' THEN B.BJYY ELSE A.ZJYY END, A.ZJYY_DW = CASE WHEN B.CJ = 1 and b.jklbh != 'fuselage_flight_time' and b.jklbh != 'landing_gear_cycle' and b.jklbh != 'special_first' and b.jklbh != 'special_second' THEN B.BJYY_DW ELSE A.ZJYY_DW END, A.WHSJ = SYSDATE WHERE A.ZJQDID = #{zjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ZT = 1

UPDATE B_S_0010301 set ZT = 0 , TBBS = 1, WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE ZJQDID IN (SELECT ID FROM B_S_001 B START WITH ID = #{zjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CONNECT BY PRIOR B.ID = B.FJDID)

UPDATE B_S_0010301 set TBBS = 1, WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where mainid in
#{item.id}
